channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Wild Cards
channel.desc: Max and Ellis go undercover, joining the cast and crew of a reality show to find out who murdered its star; in a world of scandal, deceit and lip-filler parties, every cast member is under suspicion.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Call the Midwife
channel.desc: An unexpected turn of events leads to a hastily-planned wedding; Shelagh finally goes into labor; the arrival of the pill leads to unforeseen consequences.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Karena and Kasey's Foreign Flavours
channel.desc: The sisters discover what makes authentic Hawaiian food, become inspired to make their own luau for locals and find many similarities between the U.S. islands and home in New Zealand.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Karena and Kasey's Foreign Flavours
channel.desc: Karena and Kasey discover an eclectic mix of European influences in Argentina and lots of meat; the chefs try to take over a closed-door restaurant after sampling the best cuts of beef.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: CBC Ottawa News
channel.desc: Coverage of the top local news.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Abi and Carl conspire to cover their tracks, and Steve panics to think Dorin's popped out.

channel.name: CBC Ottawa CA
channel.title: Just for Laughs: Gags
channel.desc: There's no sound, but there sure are plenty of laughs. This crazy Quebec-based troupe uses the city as its stage, and its inhabitants, or victims, as characters! People are caught in a twisted yet funny web of comedic deception. This updated "Candid Camera" is a tad more risque and a little kookier with its practical jokes. The little snippets last only a few minutes, and some look more painful than others.
